SQL_Server_Auth_EntraIDIntegrated.explanation: The server should be integrated with Azure Active Directory for authentication and authorization. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/relational-databases/security/authentication-access/azure-ad-authentication-sql-server-overview?view=sql-server-ver16

SQL_Server_Auditing.explanation: The server should have auditing enabled. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/relational-databases/security/auditing/sql-server-audit-database-engine?view=sql-server-ver16

SQL_Server_TLS_1.2.explanation: The server should have TLS 1.2 enabled. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/database-engine/configure-windows/certificate-overview?view=sql-server-ver16

SQL_Server_Network_Access.explanation: The server should have public network access disabled. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-sql/database/connectivity-settings?view=azuresql&tabs=azure-portal

SQL_Server_Outbound_Network_Access.explanation: The server should have restrictions on outbound network access disabled. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/sql-server/install/configure-the-windows-firewall-to-allow-sql-server-access?view=sql-server-ver16

SQL_Server_Private_Endpoint_Connections.explanation: The server should have private endpoint connections enabled. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-sql/database/private-endpoint-overview?view=azuresql

SQL_Server_Firewall_Rules.explanation: The server should have no more than 10 firewall rules enabled. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/sql-server/install/configure-the-windows-firewall-to-allow-sql-server-access?view=sql-server-ver16

SQL_Firewall_IP_Range.explanation: The server should have a firewall IP range set, no more than 10 IPs. For more information: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/sql-server/install/configure-the-windows-firewall-to-allow-sql-server-access?view=sql-server-ver16
